text: وجاءت كل نفس معها سائق وشهيد

translations.translation: Every self will come together with a driver and a witness:
Each soul will come with a driver and a witness.
Everyone has come, each attended by one who will drive him on, and another who will bear witness.
Every soul will be accompanied (by an angel) behind him and another as a witness.
And every soul came, along with a herder and a witness.
And every person will come forth along with a Sa'iq and a Shahid.
And every soul shall come, with it a driver and a witness.
And every soul shall come, and with it a driver and a witness.
And every soul cometh, along with it a driver and a witness.
Each person will arrive attended by an [angel] to drive him on and another to bear witness.
And there shall come every soul therewith shall be a driver and a witness.
Every soul will come accompanied by [two angels], a driver, and a witness:
And there will come forth every soul: with each will be an (angel) to drive, and an (angel) to bear witness.
And every person will come forth along with an (angel) to drive (him), and an (angel) to bear witness.
Each soul shall come with a driver, and a witness.
And every soul will come forward, accompanied by a driver and a witness.
And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

[50:21] And, thereat, every soul will come, to the site for the Gathering, accompanied by a driver, an angel to drive it there, and a witness, to testify to its deeds, namely, the hands and the feet and others; and it will be said to the disbeliever:

(And every soul cometh, along with it a driver) leading it to its Lord; this driver is the angel who recorded the evil deeds it had committed (and a witness) before its Lord; this is the angels who recorded its good deeds; and it is also said that this witness is man's works. 606

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ } قال الإِمامُ زيد بن علي عليهما السَّلامُ: فالسَّائقُ: الذي يَسوقُها إلى أَمرِ الله تعالى
 والشَّهيدُ: الذي يَشهدُ عليها بمَا عَملتْ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما بعث الأموات من أجداثهم للحشر والجزاء { جَآءَتْ } وحضرت { كُلُّ نَفْسٍ } من النفوس الطيبة والخبيثة { مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ } موكل، يسوقها إلى المحشر للعرض والجزاء { وَشَهِيدٌ } [ق: 21] من حفظة أعمالها وأحوالها، يشهد لها وعليها

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: وتخصيص الوعيد بالذكر لتهويله، ولذلك بدأ ببيان حال الكفرة بقوله: { وجاءت كُلُّ نَفْسٍ } من النفوس البرّة والفاجرة { معها سائق وشهيد } أي: ملكان، أحدهما يسوقه إلى المحشر، والآخر يشهد عليه بعمله
